article_title: Google Adds Mobile-App Development Platform Pixate
article_text:
Google Inc. said it is adding the mobile-app development platform Pixate to its suite of services for designers.

The Pixate tool enables app makers to create visual prototypes that run on Apple and Android devices.

A basic version of the service will...
